verses.verse: So they brought<WH935> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430>, and set<WH3322> it in the middle<WH8432> of the tent<WH168> that David<WH1732> had pitched<WH5186> for it<WH7126>: and they offered burnt sacrifices<WH5930> and peace offerings<WH8002> before<WH6440> God<WH430>.

And when David<WH1732> had made an end<WH3615> of offering<WH5927> the burnt offerings<WH5930> and the peace offerings<WH8002>, he blessed<WH1288> the people<WH5971> in the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And he dealt<WH2505> to every one<WH376> of Israel<WH3478>, both man<WH376> and woman<WH802>, to every one<WH376> a loaf<WH3603> of bread<WH3899>, and a good piece of flesh<WH829>, and a flagon of wine<WH809>.

And he appointed<WH5414> certain of the Levites<WH3881> to minister<WH8334> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068>, and to record<WH2142>, and to thank<WH3034> and praise<WH1984> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>:

Asaph<WH623> the chief<WH7218>, and next<WH4932> to him Zechariah<WH2148>, Jeiel<WH3273>, and Shemiramoth<WH8070>, and Jehiel<WH3171>, and Mattithiah<WH4993>, and Eliab<WH446>, and Benaiah<WH1141>, and Obed<WH5654>–edom: and Jeiel<WH3273> with psalteries<WH5035> and with harps<WH3658>; but Asaph<WH623> made a sound<WH8085> with cymbals<WH4700>;
Benaiah<WH1141> also and Jahaziel<WH3166> the priests<WH3548> with trumpets<WH2689> continually<WH8548> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of God<WH430>.
Then on that day<WH3117> David<WH1732> delivered<WH5414> first<WH7218> this psalm to thank<WH3034> the Lord<WH3068> into the hand<WH3027> of Asaph<WH623> and his brothers<WH251>.
Give thanks<WH3034> unto the Lord<WH3068>, call<WH7121> upon his name<WH8034>, make known<WH3045> his deeds<WH5949> among the people<WH5971>.
Sing<WH7891> unto him<WH2167>, sing psalms unto him<WH7878>, talk you of all his wondrous works<WH6381>.
Glory<WH1984> you in his holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>: let the heart<WH3820> of them rejoice<WH8055> that seek<WH1245> the Lord<WH3068>.
Seek<WH1875> the Lord<WH3068> and his strength<WH5797>, seek<WH1245> his face<WH6440> continually<WH8548>.
Remember<WH2142> his marvelous<WH6381> works that he has done<WH6213>, his wonders<WH4159>, and the judgments<WH4941> of his mouth<WH6310>;
O you seed<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> his servant<WH5650>, you sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290>, his chosen ones<WH972>.
He is the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430>; his judgments<WH4941> are in all the earth<WH776>.
Be you mindful<WH2142> always<WH5769> of his covenant<WH1285>; the word<WH1697> which he commanded<WH6680> to a thousand<WH505> generations<WH1755>;
Even of the covenant which he made<WH3772> with Abraham<WH85>, and of his oath<WH7621> unto Isaac<WH3327>;
And has confirmed<WH5975> the same to Jacob<WH3290> for a law<WH2706>, and to Israel<WH3478> for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285>,
Saying<WH559>, Unto you will I give<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, the lot<WH2256> of your inheritance<WH5159>;
When you were but few<WH4557>, even a few<WH4592>, and strangers in it<WH1481>.
And when they went<WH1980> from nation<WH1471> to nation<WH1471>, and from one kingdom<WH4467> to another<WH312> people<WH5971>;
He allowed<WH3240> no man<WH376> to do them wrong<WH6231>: Yes<WH3198>, he reproved kings for their sakes<WH4428>,
Saying<WH5060>, Touch not my anointed<WH4899>, and do my prophets<WH5030> no harm<WH7489>.
Sing<WH7891> unto the Lord<WH3068>, all the earth<WH776>; show forth<WH1319> from day<WH3117> to day<WH3117> his salvation<WH3444>.
Declare<WH5608> his glory<WH3519> among the heathen<WH1471>; his marvelous works<WH6381> among all nations<WH5971>.
For great<WH1419> is the Lord<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984>: he also is to be feared<WH3372> above all gods<WH430>.
For all the gods<WH430> of the people<WH5971> are idols<WH457>: but the Lord<WH3068> made<WH6213> the heavens<WH8064>.
Glory<WH1935> and honor<WH1926> are in his presence<WH6440>; strength<WH5797> and gladness<WH2304> are in his place<WH4725>.
Give<WH3051> unto the Lord<WH3068>, you kindreds<WH4940> of the people<WH5971>, give<WH3051> unto the Lord<WH3068> glory<WH3519> and strength<WH5797>.

Give<WH3051> unto the Lord<WH3068> the glory<WH3519> due unto his name<WH8034>: bring<WH5375> an offering<WH4503>, and come<WH935> before<WH6440> him<WH7812>: worship the Lord<WH3068> in the beauty<WH1927> of holiness<WH6944>.
Fear<WH2342> before<WH6440> him<WH776>, all the earth: the world<WH8398> also shall be stable<WH3559>, that it be not moved<WH4131>.
Let the heavens<WH8064> be glad<WH8055>, and let the earth<WH776> rejoice<WH1523>: and let men say<WH559> among the nations<WH1471>, The Lord<WH3068> reigns<WH4427>.
Let the sea<WH3220> roar<WH7481>, and the fullness<WH4393> there<WH7704>: let the fields rejoice<WH5970>, and all that is in it.
Then shall the trees<WH6086> of the wood<WH3293> sing out<WH7442> at the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068>, because he comes<WH935> to judge<WH8199> the earth<WH776>.
O give thanks<WH3034> unto the Lord<WH3068>; for he is good<WH2896>; for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever<WH5769>.

And say<WH559> you<WH3467>, Save us<WH430>, O God of our salvation<WH3468>, and gather us together<WH6908>, and deliver<WH5337> us from the heathen<WH1471>, that we may give thanks<WH3034> to your holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>, and glory<WH7623> in your praise<WH8416>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5769>. And all the people<WH5971> said<WH559>, Amen<WH543>, and praised<WH1984> the Lord<WH3068>.

So he left<WH5800> there before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> Asaph<WH623> and his brothers<WH251>, to minister<WH8334> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> continually<WH8548>, as every day<WH3117>'s work<WH1697> required<WH3117>:
And Obed<WH5654>–edom with their brothers<WH251>, sixty<WH8346> and eight<WH8083>; Obed<WH5654>–edom also the son<WH1121> of Jeduthun<WH3038> and Hosah<WH2621> to be porters<WH7778>:
And Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and his brothers<WH251> the priests<WH3548>, before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord<WH3068> in the high place<WH1116> that was at Gibeon<WH1391>,

To offer<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> unto the Lord<WH3068> upon the altar<WH4196> of the burnt offering<WH5930> continually<WH8548> morning<WH1242> and evening<WH6153>, and to do according to all that is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of the Lord<WH3068>, which he commanded<WH6680> Israel<WH3478>;

And with them Heman<WH1968> and Jeduthun<WH3038>, and the rest<WH7605> that were chosen<WH1305>, who were expressed<WH5344> by name<WH8034>, to give thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068>, because his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever<WH5769>;

And with them Heman<WH1968> and Jeduthun<WH3038> with trumpets<WH2689> and cymbals<WH4700> for those that should make a sound<WH8085>, and with musical<WH7892> instruments<WH3627> of God<WH430>. And the sons<WH1121> of Jeduthun<WH3038> were porters<WH8179>.
And all the people<WH5971> departed<WH3212> every man<WH376> to his house<WH1004>: and David<WH1732> returned<WH5437> to bless<WH1288> his house<WH1004>.
